price: 111. Aniguse ma ogi, waa intaasoo ay idiin tahay fidmo (imtixaan dib u dhigidda cadaabka) iyo raaxo ku eg ilaa muddo.
arabic: وَإِنۡ أَدۡرِي لَعَلَّهُۥ فِتۡنَةٞ لَّكُمۡ وَمَتَٰعٌ إِلَىٰ حِينٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-in adrī laʿallahu fit'natun lakum wamatāʿun ilā ḥīnin
